definition: to give answering phrase (school exercise in memory or composition)
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple

sentences.english: The author believes that this paper will be of help to the exploration of INSET in the context of curriculum reform.
sentences.chinese: 相信本文對課改下教師教育的探索有所啓發和幫助。
